name: Lord of the Rings - Battle for Middle Earth II - Rise of the Witch King
description: Install "Official patch 1.06 version" of BFME2 beforehand. It is required for this version of ROTWK.

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Electronic Arts/The Lord of the Rings, The Rise of the Witch-king/lotrbfme2ep1.exe

files.rotwk_patch2_01: N/A:Please select the installer for patch 2.01 of "The Rise of the Witch-king".

files.rotwk_patch2_02v8_0_0: N/A:Please select the installer for the fan patch 2.02 v8.0.0 of "The Rise of the Witch-king".

files.rotwk_patch2_02v8_2_0: N/A:Please select the installer for the fan patch 2.02 v8.2.0 of "The Rise of the Witch-king".

task.name: wineexec
task.description: Run game installer (Select "Quit" after installation has finished)

task.executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Electronic Arts/The Lord of the Rings, The Rise of the Witch-king/202_launcher.exe
task.name: wineexec
task.description: Running 2.02 setup launcher (Set resolution under "Tools"->"Resolution fixer")

content:
files:
- rotwk_patch2_01: N/A:Please select the installer for patch 2.01 of "The Rise of
    the Witch-king".
- rotwk_patch2_02v8_0_0: N/A:Please select the installer for the fan patch 2.02 v8.0.0
    of "The Rise of the Witch-king".
- rotwk_patch2_02v8_2_0: N/A:Please select the installer for the fan patch 2.02 v8.2.0
    of "The Rise of the Witch-king".
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Electronic Arts/The Lord of the Rings, The Rise of the
    Witch-king/lotrbfme2ep1.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating 32-bit Wine Prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- insert-disc:
    requires: AutoRun.exe
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Run game installer (Select "Quit" after installation has finished)
    executable: $DISC/AutoRun.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing official patch 2.01
    executable: rotwk_patch2_01
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing fan patch 2.02 v8.0.0
    executable: rotwk_patch2_02v8_0_0
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing fan patch 2.02 v8.2.0
    executable: rotwk_patch2_02v8_2_0
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Running 2.02 setup launcher (Set resolution under "Tools"->"Resolution
      fixer")
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Electronic Arts/The Lord of the Rings,
      The Rise of the Witch-king/202_launcher.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
requires: the-lord-of-the-rings-the-bat-official-patch-106
